Name: Shri Piyush Goyal
Position: LEADER OF THE HOUSE, RAJYA SABHA
EducationalQualification: B.Com., LL.B., F.C.A. Educated at Don Bosco High School, Mumbai, Jai Hind College, Mumbai, H.R. College of Commerce and Economics, Mumbai, Government Law College, Mumbai and Institute of Chartered Accountants of India, New Delhi
PermanentAddress: 28, Sonmarg, Laxmibai Jagmohandas Marg, Nepean Sea Road, Mumbai

PositionsHeld.Position: Director (Government nominee), Bank of Baroda
Member, Task Force for Interlinking of Rivers, Government of India
Director (Government nominee), State Bank of India
National Treasurer, Bharatiya Janata Party
Elected to Rajya Sabha
Member, Committee on Finance
Member, Consultative Committee for the Ministry of Defence
Member, Committee on Provision of Computer Equipment to Members of Rajya Sabha

Minister of State (Independent Charge) of the Ministry of Power; Minister of State (Independent Charge) of the Ministry of Coal; and Minister of State (Independent Charge) of the Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
Minister of State (Independent Charge) of the Ministry of Mines
Re-elected to Rajya Sabha (second term)
Minister of Railways; and Minister of Coal
Minister of Finance; and Minister of Corporate Affairs
Minister of Finance; and Minister of Corporate Affairs
Minister of Railways
Minister of Commerce and Industry
Deputy Leader of the House, Rajya Sabha
Minister of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution
Minister of Textiles
Leader of the House, Rajya Sabha
Member, General Purposes Committee
Re-elected to Rajya Sabha (third term)

SocialAndCulturalActivities: Was involved with NGOs in diverse fields such as tribal welfare and education
Was actively involved with several trade and industry associations and social organizations all over the country
Delivered lectures on the subjects of banking, finance and commerce in seminars and workshops organised by various bodies such as the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India
Participated in leadership programmes of Yale University, 2011, Oxford University, 2012 and Princeton University, 2013
SportsClubsPastimes: Reading, debating, social work, yoga and watching films
OtherInformation: Associated with the Bharatiya Janata Party (B.J.P.) since 1984

Has held several positions in the party such as Member, National Executive, Bharatiya Janata Yuva Morcha; Secretary, B.J.P., Mumbai; National Campaign In-charge for the Lok Sabha Elections, 1991; Treasurer, B.J.P., Maharashtra; Head, Information Communication Campaign Committee, General Elections, 2014; currently Member, National Executive, B.J.P.
